mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.title: Mineral Chance Config
mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ext: The chance a mineral is dropped when an overworld stone block is broken. By default 1/50.
mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.extraMin: Extra Mineral Chance On Overworld Stone Break
mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ext: The chance a mineral is dropped when a nether stone block is broken. By default 1/100.
mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.extraMin: Extra Mineral Chance On Nether Stone Break
mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ena: If enabled, mining overworld stone blocks in the overworld has a chance to drop an overworld mineral. These consist of diamonds, gold nuggets, iron nuggets, lapis lazuli, redstone and emeralds.
If enabled, mining nether stone blocks in the nether has a chance to drop a nether mineral. These consist of quartz and gold nuggets.
mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_sen: If enabled, sends a message when a mineral is found to the player who broke the stone block.
mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_fou: The message sent to the player who found a hidden mineral when 'sendMessageOnMineralFind' is enabled.
mineralchance-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ign: If enabled, minerals won't be dropped if the player is a fake. For example when a mod breaks a block as a simulated player.
